en.title: Fusion Excel's Medical Consultant And Speaker : Prof. Dr. Vichit Punyahotra
en.content:
PROF.DR.VICHIT  PUNYAHOTRA
 
EDUCATION

 - Doctor of Medicine (M.D.)
 - Doctor of Science (D.Sc.)
 - Diplomate, American Board of Plastic Surgery (Duke University Med. Center)
 - Diploma in Occupational Health and Safety (D.OH.S.)
 - Diploma in Safety Management (Australia)
 - Diploma in Disaster Management (A.I.T.)
 - Diploma in Injury Prevention (Johns Hopkins)
 - Diploma in Traffic Safety (Sweden)
 - Diploma in Sport Medicine (International Federation in Sport Medicine)
 - Certificate in Demand Side Management (International Institute for Energy Conservation)

PRESENT STATUS

 - Emeritus Professor (Mahidol University)
 - Member of The National Economic & Social Advisory Council of Thailand
 - President of International Health Institute
 - President of Health Foundation
 - President of Consumer Association (Thailand) (CAT)
 - President of Asian Institute for Safety – Health – Environment and Energy Conservation    
   (AI-SHEEC)
 - Chairman of Safety – Health and Environment Company Limited (SHE)
 - Chairman of The Health Group and Companies

EXPERIENCES

 - Chairman, Committee of  Science & Technology, Resources, Environment and Energy(NESACT) 
 - Advisor to World Health Organization (WHO) 
 - Advisor to the Prime Minister (General Prem Tinasulanonda)
 - Secretary General, National Safety Council of Thailand, Office of the Prime Minister
 - Chairman of The National Safety Education Center
 - Chairman of The National Accident Research Center
 - Chairman of The National Traffic Safety Board
 - Chairman of The National Occupational Safety Board
 - Member of Asia – Pacific Occupational Safety Council
 - Advisor to Standing Committee on Environment (Parliament)
 - Advisor to the Governor of Industrial Estate Authority of Thailand
 - Advisor to Deputy Minister of Commerce
 - Advisor to Deputy Minister of Labour & Social welfare 
 - Advisor to Standing Committee on Public Health (Senate)

HONOUR

 - Honour by Biography Fame International as the “ International Outstanding People” (1995)
 - Honour by Marquis “Who’s Who in the World” as one in 30,000 VIP of the world (1998)
